column4: Hey guys. Is there a list of what processes CAN be disabled under a default Ubuntu install? I'm running from a laptop and hoping to cut down on power consumption
starting point is system -> adminstration -> services .
I was hoping for a more verbose output of what these services are so I don't just turn off services willy-nilly and bork my system
yeah, as ejer said, pretty much all of the processes on your linux box are there for a good reason.
